Class HandCard

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor, com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.Layout

    public class HandCard
extends FixedObject
implements com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor
    Specifies how the cards look and behave on the player's hand.

      • move

        public void move(com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Stage st,
        int cameraInitialX)
        Description copied from class: FixedObject
        This should be called whenever the camera is updated. The object's position is adjusted accordingly, unless the object is draggable.
        Overrides:
        move in class FixedObject
        Parameters:
        st - The stage which contains the camera.
        cameraInitialX - The initial position of the camera on the screen.
